title: Evaluate a Sponsorship Request
description: The company has received a request to sponsor a local event. A manager needs to evaluate if the opportunity aligns with their marketing goals.

tasks.description: Review the sponsorship proposal to understand the event, its audience, and the cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the key details from the proposal.

tasks.description: Compare the event's audience demographics to the brand's target audience persona.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines if there is a strong audience match.

tasks.description: Assess if the potential brand exposure and lead generation opportunities justify the cost.
Make a final recommendation to approve or decline the sponsorship request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, data-backed recommendation.
